hibernate-mapping.sql-query: call SEM.SEM_SP_MRT001_BALANCE(?, cast(:rentalAmt as numeric), :rentPeriodType, cast(:effectiveDt as date), cast(:expireDt as date), :payPeriodType, cast(:payPeriod as numeric), cast(:periodStartDt as date), cast(:periodEndDt as date), cast(:periodAmt as numeric), :siteRentCondId, :vendorMasterId, :payeeMasterId)
